definition: Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: This essay will disscuss sound of Dongkou County in Hunan Province that has the Gan dialect phonological characters.
sentences.chinese: 本文所描述的的對象是湖南省洞口縣的贛方言音韻。

sentences.english: Dongkou is the commercial pig export in China.
sentences.chinese: 洞口縣是全國瘦肉型商品豬出口基地縣之一。
